room_title: Escape room "The Party Room" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: Loved the Party Room! Great atmosphere for our family! We had fun working as a team trying to figure out the puzzles. Staff was upbeat and fun to work with. Can't wait to return to try a different room! We would Highly recommend on your next visit to Des Moines!

room_title: Escape room "The Party Room" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: We escaped Simons Party Room last night with only 25 seconds left. Our game master guided us through as we uncovered hints. They told us it was a hard room and between 11 of us and we did a great job together. We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Party Room" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: We had purchased a Groupon for this, so were excited to try it. We has reserved a certain time, but were assigned with a large party that was so rude and obnoxious, the nice guys working assigned us to the later time. Our group then was super fun and very friendly. It definitely works your brain and makes you work as a team! Pretty difficult, but a lot of fun. We did escape.

room_title: Escape room "The Party Room" by Escape Chambers in Des Moines
review: We were a group of 8...2 adults and kids aged 15-10 and did The Party Room. What an awesome time we had trying to solve all the puzzles and riddles. Our room monitor Bailey was so helpful, you can tell she really loves what she does:) As we were walking out of the building, everyone was asking when can we come back again to try another room!!!
